mean_max_t = analysis.period_mean(df,
                    'Maximum Temperature',
                    round_value=True,
                    to_nearest=0,
                    data_type='integer')

median_min_t = analysis.period_median(df,
                    'Minimum Temperature',
                    round_value=True,
                    to_nearest=0,
                    data_type='integer')
